thread.title: Sellbrite Connects WooCommerce Merchants To Major Marketplaces
thread.title_full: Sellbrite Connects WooCommerce Merchants To Major Marketplaces - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Sellbrite Connects WooCommerce Merchants To Major Marketplaces
text:
Sellbrite, a leading multichannel ecommerce solution, announced it has launched an integration with WooCommerce, the #1 ecommerce plugin for Wordpress, connecting WooCommerce merchants to the major marketplaces, and allowing marketplace merchants to easily populate a WooCommerce store.
Pasadena, CA (PRWEB) October 20, 2015
Sellbrite, a leading multichannel ecommerce solution , announced it has launched an integration with WooCommerce, the #1 ecommerce plugin for Wordpress, and one of the fastest-growing ecommerce platforms in the world.
The Sellbrite and WooCommerce partnership enables merchants to easily import their WooCommerce products and list them on popular marketplaces, such as Amazon, eBay and Etsy, as well as sync inventory, fulfill orders, and run reports.
The integration works two ways, so Sellbrite merchants can also populate their WooCommerce web store with the products in their Sellbrite catalog or from their marketplace listings.
With this integration, WooCommerce becomes the 7th sales channel available to Sellbrite merchants.
“We’re extremely excited about partnering with WooCommerce and offering their customers a simple multichannel solution to help them grow their businesses. Wordpress powers over 20% of the web, and the explosive growth of WooCommerce is a testament to the quality of the software and its team,” says Brian Nolan, Co-Founder and CEO of Sellbrite.
WooCommerce is now an available channel for all Sellbrite customers. To see why merchants love Sellbrite, start your 14-day free trial at http://www.sellbrite.com/try-sellbrite .
About Sellbrite
Sellbrite helps retailers grow sales by extending their online presence and making it easy to manage what they sell and where they sell it. Sellbrite's simple and intuitive, cloud-based software removes the complexity of selling on multiple online channels, enabling merchants to easily create listings for their products, control and sync inventory, and manage and fulfill orders. It also provides merchants with cross-channel reporting and analytics. The platform has deep integrations with many of the most popular online marketplaces, shopping carts and services, such as Amazon, eBay, Etsy, Shopify, Bigcommerce, WooCommerce, Magento, and ShipStation. For more information, visit http://www.sellbrite.com .
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13031593.htm
